pages.title: Crafting Lamp Posts
pages.text: $(br)$(l)Lamp posts!$()$(br2)They are the guide, lighting up the way wherever you go...$(br2)They are the guard, keeping darkness away from your home...
$(br)In fact, not only $(#FFBB00)lanterns$(), but also $(#11DD88)hanging plants$() can be attached to lamp posts. And lamp posts don't have to stand straight - they can be pasted onto walls, too.
